title: Can I Play Ranked with my Laughable Ping?
body: The Title pretty much says it all. I have been playing league for at least 3 years now. I have played ranked at least once or twice in S5 back in my Main account but never took it serious because of my Ping which was at 250 -  290. But right now I'm craving a little Ranked games however I do not wanna ruin others experiences and climbing because of my Ping but I don't really know if this ping will affect their gameplay or mine at all. I'm a total noob when it comes to gaming on the pc. Ripperino

replies.body: That ping is pretty high, is it something I might be able to help with or just playing from a really far physical distance?  For your own sanity and other players, you definitely want to make sure you can play at your best.  Let me know if I could help!

I'm just playing at a far away distance since I couldn't find any server that is close to Southeast Asia. I didn't want to try garena since that thing is garbage. Do you happened to know any server that is close to Southeast Asia and is an english speaking server? Thanks for your help Rioter.

The closest to you that supports English could be OCE, per the[ supported languages ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751594-Changing-Game-Language)guide.  It's ultimately up to you, just keep in mind that your distance can be a major culprit of connection issues like that.  Good luck!
Not recommended, i'd say 60-70 be the highest if you can manage it i play at 45.
